clients.title: Get Found on the Justia Lawyer Directory
description: People searching for a lawyer on the Justia Lawyer Directory may filter their search results based on a number of parameters to find a lawyer who best fits their needs. If you don't yet have a Justia Lawyer Rating, you risk getting filtered out by users looking only for highly ranked lawyers. Don't get lost in the shuffle; ask colleagues familiar with your work to write you a review!
